      • CONFIG_FLUSHABLE_COMMIT_ON_BATCH

        public static final String CONFIG_FLUSHABLE_COMMIT_ON_BATCH
        Flag for committing the Flume transaction on each batch for Flushable datasets. When set to false, Flume will only commit the transaction when roll interval has expired. Setting this to false requires enough space in the channel to handle all events delivered during the roll interval. Defaults to true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_FLUSHABLE_COMMIT_ON_BATCH

        public static boolean DEFAULT_FLUSHABLE_COMMIT_ON_BATCH

      • CONFIG_SYNCABLE_SYNC_ON_BATCH

        public static final String CONFIG_SYNCABLE_SYNC_ON_BATCH
        Flag for syncing the DatasetWriter on each batch for Syncable datasets. Defaults to true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SYNCABLE_SYNC_ON_BATCH

        public static boolean DEFAULT_SYNCABLE_SYNC_ON_BATCH

      • CONFIG_KITE_ERROR_DATASET_URI

        public static final String CONFIG_KITE_ERROR_DATASET_URI
        The URI to write non-recoverable Flume events to in the case of an error. If the dataset doesn't exist, it will be created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RETRY_FAILURE_POLICY

        public static final String RETRY_FAILURE_POLICY
        Retry non-recoverable Flume events. This will lead to a never ending cycle of failure, but matches the previous default semantics of the DatasetSink.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String DEFAULT_FAILURE_POLICY
